text.text: IS THERE ANYTHING WORTH SEEING IN SHANGHAI?
上海有没有值得看看的地方?
Ms Wang:Is this your first visit to Shanghai?
王小姐:你这是第一次来上海吗?
Mr. Lee: Yes.Is there anything worth seeing in Shanghai?
李先生:是的，上海有没有值得看看的地方?
Ms Wang:Yes.There's a lot to see. I'll show you around ifyou like.
王小姐:有，可看的很多。如果你4愿意，我带你游玩。
李先生:噢，那太感谢你了。
